instructions: Go to Settings > FaceTime > Blocked. Tap Add New at the bottom of the list. Tap a contact you want to block.

Go to Create your Google Account . Enter your name. Set Your email address to your corporate email. Don't click I would like a new Gmail address . Complete the remaining account information. Click Next step . Follow the on-screen instructions to finish creating your account.
Open the portal . You might need to sign in. Click Configurations in the navigation panel. Click Add in the Configurations table.
Open the portal . You might need to sign in. Click Configurations in the navigation panel. Select the configuration you want applied to new devices in the Default configuration panel. Click Apply .

Open the portal . You might need to sign in. Click Devices in the navigation panel. Find the device you want to apply the configuration to using its IMEI or serial number. Set Configuration to the configuration you want to apply or select No config to temporarily remove the device from zero-touch enrollment.

Open the portal . You might need to sign in. Click Devices in the navigation panel. Click More in the Devices table header. Click Upload batch configurations . Select your CSV file from the file picker. Click Upload .

Open the portal . You might need to sign in. Click Devices in the navigation panel. Find the device you want to deregister in the Devices table. Click Deregister in the device row. Click Deregister in the confirmation panel.

Factory reset the device. Click the link to contact your device s provider in the Your device at work screen. Make a note of the telephone number, email address, and the identifiers in Device information .
